title: v24.31.0
text:
## What's Changed * add notifications for file upload , prescription by @rash-27 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2070 * Adds support for phone number in HCX Create Patient Profile by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2319 * HCX: Adds "use" in patient profile's telecom by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2321 * Adds a last online filter for users by @skks1212 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2310 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2322 * Fix Scribe on iOS by @skks1212 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2323 * HCX: Fix payor search filtering and claim supporting info category URL by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2325 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 | Minor Fix by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2326 * Production release v24.31.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2327 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care/compare/v24.30.0...v24.31.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.31.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.31.0
text:
## What's Changed * Added primary color to selected section on consultation page fix #8186 by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8188 * Removed View Discharge Patients button fix #8164 by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8184 * Added a last online filter for users by @skks1212 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8175 * Add popup to acknowledge discharge by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8211 * Enhancements to Camera Feed Component by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8140 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8210 * Fixes last active filter badge showing up when filters other than the last active filter is applied by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8215 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 | Minor Fix by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8217 * Production release v24.31.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8230 ## New Contributors * @NitinPSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8188 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/compare/v24.30.1...v24.31.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.31.0.
author: sainak
